languages.text: "Ты говоришь о Номосе, Темный. Он — гость элантаха, как и мы с тобой. Возможно, более почетный, потому не бери в голову даже мысль о том, чтобы изучить его одним из ваших методов, если не хочешь навлечь на себя праведный гнев".

"You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь о Номосе, Темный. Он — гость элантаха, как и мы с тобой. Возможно, более почетный, потому не бери в голову даже мысль о том, чтобы изучить его одним из ваших методов, если не хочешь навлечь на себя праведный гнев".

traits.locale_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你说的是诺莫斯，黑暗之子。他与你我一样，都是外界人的客人，或许还是更加尊贵的客人，所以最好别用你一贯的方式来检查它……否则正义的怒火就会降临到你身上。”
languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: “你说的是诺莫斯，黑暗之子。他与你我一样，都是外界人的客人，或许还是更加尊贵的客人，所以最好别用你一贯的方式来检查它……否则正义的怒火就会降临到你身上。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Il s'agit de Nomos, Eldar noir. C'est un invité de l'elantach, au même titre que vous et moi. Et peut-être même a-t-il un statut plus important encore, alors ne vous avisez pas de l'examiner avec vos méthodes habituelles... au risque de subir la colère du juste. »
languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit de Nomos, Eldar noir. C'est un invité de l'elantach, au même titre que vous et moi. Et peut-être même a-t-il un statut plus important encore, alors ne vous avisez pas de l'examiner avec vos méthodes habituelles... au risque de subir la colère du juste. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Te refieres a Nomos, Oscuro. Es un invitado de{mf|l| la} elantach, igual que tú y yo. Aunque parece que goza de un estatus más honorable, así que no intentes examinarlo con tus métodos habituales... si quieres evitar que la furia justiciera recaiga sobre ti».
languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Te refieres a Nomos, Oscuro. Es un invitado de{mf|l| la} elantach, igual que tú y yo. Aunque parece que goza de un estatus más honorable, así que no intentes examinarlo con tus métodos habituales... si quieres evitar que la furia justiciera recaiga sobre ti».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ノモスのことか、闇の者。あれはあなたや私と同じ、エランタの客人だ。私たちより尊い客なのだろう、いつものやり口で試そうと思わぬことだ…道理のとおった怒りを招きたくないのならな」
languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「ノモスのことか、闇の者。あれはあなたや私と同じ、エランタの客人だ。私たちより尊い客なのだろう、いつものやり口で試そうと思わぬことだ…道理のとおった怒りを招きたくないのならな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht von Nomos, Dunkler. Das ist ein Gast des Elantach, genau wie Ihr und ich. Vielleicht ein größerer Ehrengast. Denkt also gar nicht daran, ihn mit Euren üblichen Methoden zu untersuchen. Nicht, wenn Ihr es vermeiden wollt, rechtschaffenen Zorn auf Euch zu ziehen."
languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht von Nomos, Dunkler. Das ist ein Gast des Elantach, genau wie Ihr und ich. Vielleicht ein größerer Ehrengast. Denkt also gar nicht daran, ihn mit Euren üblichen Methoden zu untersuchen. Nicht, wenn Ihr es vermeiden wollt, rechtschaffenen Zorn auf Euch zu ziehen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

languages.text: "Kara'dan, yani Nomos'tan bahsediyorsun. Sen ve ben gibi elantach'ın bir misafiri. Hatta belki bizden daha onurlu bir bile misafir olabilir. Yani hakkaniyetli bir gazabı üzerine salmak istemiyorsan sakın her zamanki yöntemlerinle onu incelemeye kalkışma."
languages.original_text: "You speak of Nomos, Dark One. It is a guest of the elantach, as you and I are. Perhaps a more honoured guest, so do not even think of examining it using your typical methods — not if you wish to avoid bringing righteous wrath down upon yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Kara, yani Nomos'tan bahsediyorsun. Sen ve ben gibi elantachın bir misafiri. Hatta belki bizden daha onurlu bir misafir olabilir. Yani sakın her zamanki yöntemlerini kullanarak onu incelemeye kalkışma. Hakkaniyetli bir gazabı üzerine salmak istemiyorsan tabii..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
